green-bay.neighborhoods: Downtown, Broadway District, Allouez, De Pere
green-bay.meetingHighlights: Active meetings near Lambeau Field and downtown; strong Packers game-day fellowship and regular speaker meetings.
green-bay.transitInfo: Green Bay Metro transit provides bus service; Austin Straubel International Airport (GRB) offers regional flights.

kenosha.meetingHighlights: Lakefront meetings with active evening groups; many community-based meetings in Uptown and HarborPark areas.
kenosha.transitInfo: Kenosha Transit buses serve the city; Metra commuter rail connects to Chicago; close to I-94.

madison.neighborhoods: Downtown, State Street, Willy Street, Brayton/Monroe, Atwood, Middleton (nearby)
madison.meetingHighlights: Large university-influenced fellowship with progressive meetings on State Street and Willy Street; strong young people's groups.
madison.transitInfo: Madison Metro Transit provides comprehensive bus service; Dane County Regional Airport (MSN) offers regional flights.

appleton.neighborhoods: Downtown, College Avenue, Memorial Park, Lawrence University area
appleton.meetingHighlights: Fox Cities meetings with active downtown groups; college-town fellowship with regular speaker meetings.
appleton.transitInfo: Valley Transit provides bus service throughout Appleton and Fox Cities; Appleton International Airport (ATW) for regional flights.

milwaukee.neighborhoods: Historic Third Ward, Bay View, East Side, Riverwest, Walker's Point
milwaukee.meetingHighlights: Extensive downtown and neighborhood meetings including speaker nights, Spanish-language and LGBTQ-friendly groups.
milwaukee.transitInfo: Milwaukee County Transit System (MCTS) buses and streetcar provide transit; close access to I-94 and Milwaukee Mitchell International Airport (MKE).

racine.neighborhoods: Downtown, North Side, Uptown, West Racine
racine.meetingHighlights: Community meetings with steady evening attendance and family-friendly formats.
racine.transitInfo: Racine buses and regional connections to Milwaukee; many attendees drive from surrounding suburbs.
